name: Pohjois-Pohjanmaan lintutieteellinen yhdistys ry
membership: PPLY is Member of BirdLife Finland and BirdLife International.
goal: Our goal is to protect birds and their natural habitats and support birdwatching as a hobby and as a part of scientific research.
euInitiatives: Ympäristöasiat, linnut, kestävä kehitys, metsätalous, meret, kosteikot, luonnonsuojelu, ilmastonmuutos, maatalous
